info.name: Datablase Tests
info.description: Automated testing for the Datablase API

query.description: The ID of a player that must be the batter or the pitcher in each event.
The ID of the game by which to filter results.
The ID of the pitcher that must be in each event.
The type of event by which to filter.
Include child player event records.
Include child base runner records.
The field by which to sort. Most text and numeric columns are supported.
The direction by which to sort. Must be one of ASC, DESC.

request.description: Get the list of game events that match the query. One of `playerId`, `gameId`, `pitcherId`, `batterId` must be specified.

response.name: The events that match the query and the number of matching events.

item.name: Calculate the number of events for each batter or pitcher.

query.description: (Required) The type of event to count.
The ID of the batter(s) by which to filter.
The ID of the pitcher(s) by which to filter.

request.description: Get the number of events for a batter or pitcher with a certain `event_type`.

response.name: The number of events the batter was involved in with the specified type.

query.description: The name of the player (takes precedence if slug is specified)
The url_slug of the player

request.description: Get extended player info for a given player, given a player id, name, or slug.

query.description: The player ID of the player (takes precedence if other params are specified)
The name of the player (takes precedence if slug is specified)
The url_slug of the player
(default:false) If true, all historical info for the player will be returned, rather than just the current info

request.description: Get extended player info for a given player, given a player id, name, or slug.

query.description: The player ID of the player (takes precedence if other params are specified)
The name of the player (takes precedence if slug is specified)
(default:false) If true, all historical info for the player will be returned, rather than just the current info

request.description: Get extended player info for a given player, given a player id, name, or slug.

query.description: The name of the player
If true, only players currently using this name will be returned

request.description: Get all player IDs matching a given name

query.description: The name of the player
If true, only players currently using this name will be returned
The name of the player
If true, only players currently using this name will be returned

request.description: Get all player IDs matching a given name

query.description: The name of the player
If true, only players currently using this name will be returned
The name of the player
If true, only players currently using this name will be returned

request.description: Get all player IDs matching a given name

query.description: The name of the player
If true, only players currently using this name will be returned

request.description: Get the list of all players currently tagged with some kind of modification (like SHELLED)

response.name: array of player information including current team id/nickname

query.description: whether to include players in the Shadows

request.description: Get the current list of all known players

exec: pm.test("Should get >300 players for S10D10", function () {

query.description: Season to query (zero-indexed)
Day to query (zero-indexed)

request.description: Get the list of all players and their data as of a specific Season and Gameday

response.name: array of player information including current team id/nickname

item.name: Get the season leaders for a given category and stat

query.description: Season to query (zero-indexed)
Stat category (batting, pitching, running, or fielding)
Stat to get the leaders for (as returned from /playerStats)
Ordering to use for ranking (ASC or DESC)
Number of leaders to return

request.description: Get the season leaders for a given category and stat

item.name: Get categorical statistics for the given players

query.description: either 'batting' or 'pitching'
(optional) season to get stats for
comma-separated list of player IDs

request.description: Get performance statistics for a given list of players

query.description: The ID of the team (takes precedence if slug is given)
The slug of the team

request.description: Get the current roster for a given team, using either ID or slug.

query.description: The ID of the team (takes precedence if slug is given)
The slug of the team

request.description: Get the current roster for a given team, using either ID or slug.
Get current star values for all teams
